msbt.message: Ah! ! Good morning!
Oh, ! It's good to see you!

You may have noticed, but Resident Services is closed today.Mr. Nook and I will be camped out here in the plaza all day to prepare for tonight's Countdown event. I do hope you're planning to take part in the festivities as well, . It just wouldn't be the same without you, so be sure to come back later tonight! In the meantime, have a look around. We've really pulled out all the stops, if I do say so myself.

Ah, ! I'm so glad you're here!You may have noticed, but Resident Services is closed today.Mr. Nook and I have been camped out here in the plaza all day to prepare for the Countdown event. I do hope you're planning to take part in the festivities as well, . How wonderful would it be to ring in the new year together!In the meantime, have a look around. We've really pulled out all the stops, if I do say so myself.

OH! ! You're here!<10_4 /> I wasn't sure we'd see you since it's getting so late. But there's not enough time left in the year to worry about silly things like that! We should use the remaining minutes to mentally prepare ourselves for the year to come!
! FINALLY!!! I was honestly starting to worry that you wouldn't show! Well! Are you ready to ring in the new year? I know I am!
Oh, that's right! One more thing I got you a present to help celebrate!
Oh, that's right! One more thing I got you a present to help celebrate!Hmm I can't give it to you while your pockets are full.So don't forget to come back for it before the clock strikes midnight!
It's a light stick! We're all going to wave them together once the Countdown begins.
Oh, that's right! I still have your present!
I'm still holding onto a present for you that'll come in handy during our celebration. Come find me when you have some more space in your pockets for it.

We have a big fireworks show set to start just after midnight. I'm so excited! I love fireworks! Of course, that's hours from now.I suggest squeezing in a nap sometime today if you plan on staying up late.
Today is the Countdown and tomorrow is New Year's DayI hope you're ready for some non-stop celebration!
I was up really early this morning to start setting up for today's events, so excusemy<10_4 /> AH! I CAN'T! The Countdown only happens once a year! Sleeping through it this time is NOT an option.
It's starting to hit me that this is the last day of the year But I have so much left to do!
Everybody is starting to get fired up for the main event! Especially me!
I was totally fine until a little bit ago, but now that there's less than an hour leftI'm a fluffball of nerves!
It's time to say goodbye to ! Did you keep any of your resolutions, ?
OK! Less than an hour to go! Are you ready to count?!
AH! Look at the time! I wasn't built to handle THIS much excitement!
Less than five minutes to go! Please direct your attention to the digital display.
What do you think of my outfit?Such a special night deserves extra special attire!
really flew by so quickly<10_4 /> Of course, I say that every year.
I wonder what kind of surprises next year will holdHopefully spending lots of time with my friends on !
That New Year's hat looks marvelous on you, !I like that we kind of match!
You can buy a New Year's hat from Mr. Nook if you visit his stall.You should go pick one up for today's festivities! It's nice to have an excuse to dress up, isn't it?
The new year is almost here!<10_7 arg="30" />
is almost over!<10_7 arg="30" />
AHHHH! I don't do well with change!<10_7 arg="30" />
Thank you for visiting ! What timing!
As you can see, we'll be ringing in the new year in the plaza tonight!But it's not midnight yet, so go enjoy the final day of , and come back here later!
The plaza is all decked out for the Countdown!
I hope you'll stick around and ring in the new year with all of us on !
I look forward to ringing in the new year on with you!Afterwards we're going to have a big fireworks show that you won't want to miss.
We're only a few moments away from the new year. Time to get your celebration face on!
Happy New Year, !
Oh no I don't think I've given you your present yet!
Oh! That reminds me I prepared a little present for everyone today.
Actually, I prepared a little present for everyone today.
I wanted to give it to you before the start of the new year, but we didn't get a chance to talk Well, better late than never!
It's a light stick! The new year is here, but—as you can see—the celebration is far from over!
It's a light stick! Looks like the festivities are starting to die downBut I'd still like you to have this to commemorate the occasion!
Ah, the first fireworks of ! Another reason to celebrate!
Watching fireworks as beautiful as these gives me a lot of hope for the coming year.
<10_14 arg="20" />Yay, ! HOORAY!<10_9 />Oh my! Sorry if I startled you! Whenever I see fireworks, my emotions tend to getexplosive!
May this year shine as brightly as the fireworks lighting up the sky!
There's nothing more joyful than ringing in the new year surrounded by old friends and new!
Those fireworks were just amazing! When I close my eyes, I can still see them Blooming like giant flowers in the night sky
Now that the fireworks are over, I imagine folks will start making their way home and to bed!
I'm so pleased we rang in with so much style and pizzazz!
May this new year bring us both new friendships and adventures!
Ohmy Now that the roar of the fireworks has subsidedI'm having trouble keeping my eyes HAPPY NEW YEAR!
Happy New Year!<10_4 /> I hope this is the first of many visits you'll make to in !

Happy almost New Year, ! Oh! How could I forget? We haven't met yet! I've just heard so much about you from Tom Nook that I feel like we're old friends. But please allow me to officially introduce myself. I'm Isabelle!It's closed today, but usually you can find me over at Resident Services, always ready to lend a helping hand. That's enough introductions for now. Let's get back to enjoying the Countdown event!
